titleStmt.title: Pallas armata The gentlemans armorie; wherein the right and genuine use of the rapier and of the sword, as well against the right handed as against the left handed man is displayed: and now set forth and first published for the commmon [sic] good by the author.
titleStmt.author: G. A., fl. 1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ohn] D[awson] for Iohn Williams, at the signe of the Crane in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crane in S. Pauls Church-yard
